articles.title: When Apple wanted to buy Elon Musk’s Tesla - The Times of India
articles.description: Apple once considered buying Tesla for its Project Titan but ultimately decided to build its own car. Elon Musk confirmed that he had talks with Tim Cook about the possibility of Apple acquiring Tesla.
